tool_description: This API was made with Node.js as backend and MongoDB as the database.
name: Post App
title: Post App

api_list.name: User Sign Up
api_list.description:
Using this endpoint the user has to sign in to perform any kind of operations in the future.
You will receive a verification mail in your email. Only after the email verification, the user will be added to the database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://post-app.p.rapidapi.com/api/users/signUp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "post-app.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://post-app.p.rapidapi.com/api/users/signUp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "post-app.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
